content: You'll see the exact same cutscene for this ending, where Wukong falls to his knees and loses the Six Senses from his body only for The Destined One to absorb them.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Endings_Explained.md', within the main section titled 'Endings Explained', specifically from the subsection 'Ending 2 - The (True) Secret Ending'.
The content is as follows:
You'll see the exact same cutscene for this ending, where Wukong falls to his knees and loses the Six Senses from his body only for The Destined One to absorb them.
